articles.title: Here’ what Google CEO Sundar Pichai said about Apple Vision Pro | Mint - Mint
articles.description: Google CEO Sundar Pichai said that although he hasn't tried the $3,499 Apple Vision Pro headset yet, but Google has always felt computing will evolve beyond the black rectangles.
articles.content: With the launch of Vision Pro augmented reality (AR)/virtual reality (VR) headset at its developer conference, Apple has officially kicked off the era of spatial computing. The device can be controll… [+1961 chars]
